snippet: It was hardly another day at training camp Monday as the Eagles continued to deal with the death of Coach Andy Reid’s son, Garrett Reid, who was found dead Sunday morning.
abstract: Philadelphia Eagles continue training camp activities as coach Andy Reid grieves the death of his son Garrett.
lead_paragraph: It was hardly another day at training camp Monday as the Eagles continued to deal with the death of Coach Andy Reid’s son, Garrett Reid, who was found dead Sunday morning.

headline.seo: Andy Reid Has Eagles Players’ Support After Son’s Death
headline.main: After Death of Coach’s Son, Eagles Move Forward and Stay Behind Reid
headline.print_headline: Eagles Stay Behind Reid As They Continue On
